artist: Engraver: Pieter van Gunst; Painter: Gerard Hoet
description: portrait of man facing left and looking slightly right; curly hair; flat white collar; circular frame on a pedestal within a rectangular frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ GERARDUS DE VRIES/ PROFESSOR PHILOSOPHUS ULTRAJECT/Libere: Modeste Tamen/ Hoet Pinxit   Van Gunst sculp]; on sheet in pencil: [1-541]; on verso in lower right corner in brown ink: [154]
title: Portrait of Gerardus de Vries
